We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private FractalAdaptiveMovingAverage _frama;
// In Initialize()
_frama = FRAMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_frama.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Is Ready", _frama.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Warm Up Period", _frama.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Current", _frama.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Name", _frama.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Samples", _frama.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.frama = self.FRAMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.frama.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Is Ready", self.frama.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Warm Up Period", self.frama.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Current", self.frama.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Name", self.frama.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FRAMA Samples", self.frama.Samples);
}
